price: Na namna hivi tumeiteremsha (Qur'ani) kuwa ni Aya zilizo wazi, na hakika Mwenyezi Mungu humwongoa amtakaye.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهۡدِي مَن يُرِيدُ
footnotes: Mfano wa tulivyo bainisha hoja zetu zi wazi katika tuliyo kwisha wateremshia Mitume. Tumemteremshia Muhammad Qur'ani yote, nayo ni Aya zilizo wazi ili ziwe ni hoja juu ya watu. Na hakika Mwenyezi Mungu humuongoa amtakaye kuwaongoa ili isalimike tabia yake na abaidike mbali na inadi na yanayo sabibisha hayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika anzalnāhu āyātin bayyinātin wa-anna al-laha yahdī man yurīdu
